posts.post_content:
Posted By: William Turner
I know I probably wont get any hits on this request, but I am looking for any T210 Series 6 cards that people want to sell.  I do not care what condition they are in just email me scans and what you want for them.  If you have a Fred Toney from Series 6 I would be especially interested, but I am looking for any card from the set so if you want to sell it I am intersted in buying it regardless of which player it is.  Thank you for your time

William.  email is wacturner@hotmail.com
